Text:
Wow! Loads of information on here. Nice job! :D that'll help a lot of people out.

Great torrent too. Thanks!
I downloaded it quite fast. However, when i start the game, a black screen shows up and i can't even turn off my Wii. I didn't have such troubles with the rest of my games. Help?

Oh, sorry. If anyone else has this problem:
Select the game, go to options, click the arrows next to video until you reach Force NTSC. This should do the job. It's not for all games tho, just NTSC ones.
